prompts: Create a boulder-like Pokemon with a rugged appearance and a tough demeanor.
I want a dual-type Pokemon that blends rock and ground features with sharp edges.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a rocky creature with arms and a sturdy build.
Make a Pokemon that has a heavy, stone-like body and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon with gray tones and orange accents that looks ready for battle.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the strength of mountains and the agility of a fighter.
Show me a Pokemon with a distinct rock-like texture and an imposing presence.
